BUG.Summary: When user attempts to create a report, the system displays an error message.
BUG.Description:
When user attempts to prepare a quaterly report, the system displays the message "Something went wrong. Please, contact Service Desk".
Reproduced on Windows 11, Google Chrome 102.0.5005.63 (Official Build) (64-bit).
Expected result: correct report.
Actual result: incorrect report. The fields of the report are filled with null values.
BUG.Steps_to_reproduce: 1. Open the application. 2. Select the Report function. 3. Select the report period. 4. Click the "Prepare report" button"
